properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE SECESSION_FL = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DT, SECESSION_FL FROM MEMBER WHERE SECESSION_FL = 'N' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
